articles.author: TOI Sports Desk
articles.title: Rohit Sharma breaks record for most sixes in a calendar year - IndiaTimes
articles.description: Cricket News: India captain Rohit Sharma has become the batter with the most sixes in a calendar year, surpassing the previous record set by South African AB de Vil
articles.content: World Cup 2023: England end Pakistans feeble hopes, India to play New Zealand in first semifinal
